EmailTemplate.name: 2018.12.05 - BS - Customer Survey Reminder.2018.12.05 - BS - Customer Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Last chance to get $20 in points
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com?utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> We want to hear from you!
Your opinion matters to us.
Help us improve the Business Select experience for you and our other members. Please complete the online survey by December 7th, and we'll give you $20 in points to say thank you. That's $20 you can use on your next purchase. Get Started <[[https://{{lead.Survey Link}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&email={{lead.Email Address}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
* Please allow 30 days for Grand Rewards points to be added to your account. Limit 20 points per account. Must sign in to your account to redeem your points. Offer valid at grandandtoy.com only. Open to Canadian residents only.
